page.title: 04EDUCATION PAISLEY
page.content: {St. Charles' Primary}is a purpose built school with excellent facilities.It was built to replace the old school in Union St.and was officially opened in 1969. It has a capacity for 462 pupils but its actual roll is 281. It has a{Nursery}attached which takes 30 children in the morning and thirty in the afternoon. The school is named after{St. Charles {Borromao}who was a Bishop and Cardinal of Milan.He was born in 1538 near Lake Maggiore and died in Milan in 1584 at the age of forty-six.He was canonised in 1610.His feast day is 4th. November which is when the school holds its Confirmation Day.
